# Add this to your enhanced_news_impact_scalper.py

async def process_n8n_event(self, event_data: Dict) -> List[Signal]:
    """Process events from N8N workflows"""
    
    # Create enhanced news event from N8N data
    enhanced_event = EnhancedNewsEvent(
        event_id=event_data.get('event_id', f"N8N_{datetime.now().timestamp()}"),
        timestamp=datetime.fromisoformat(event_data.get('processed_at', datetime.now().isoformat())),
        category=EventCategory(event_data.get('category', 'ECONOMIC_DATA')),
        tier=EventTier(event_data.get('tier', 'TIER_2')),
        headline=event_data.get('announcement', 'N8N Event'),
        symbols_affected=event_data.get('symbols_affected', ['NIFTY']),
        impact_magnitude=event_data.get('impact_magnitude', 'MEDIUM'),
        market_sensitivity=to_decimal(str(event_data.get('market_sensitivity', 7.0))),
        metadata={
            'source': 'N8N',
            'processing_priority': event_data.get('execution_timing', 'NORMAL'),
            'trading_action': event_data.get('recommended_action', 'MONITOR')
        }
    )
    
    # Process through existing enhanced event system
    return await self.process_enhanced_news_event(enhanced_event)
